title: Live The Moment Lyrics Kathai Thiraikathai Vasanam Song Lyrics
singerName: Haricharan, Nakul, Premgi Amaren, Venkat Prabhu
stanzas:
Song: Live The Moment
Singer: Haricharan, Venkat Prabhu, Premgi Amaren, Nagulan, Shanthnu Bhagyaraj
Music: Thaman
Lyricist: Madhan Karky
Movie: Kathai Thiraikathai Vasanam

Sogam podhum nippaatidu
Sorgam poga ticket edu.
Coolaa vazha thittamidu
Kooththaattam kooda nippaatidu.

Teaser illaa, trailer illaa
Movie peru vazhkkadaa
Aduththa scene theriyavenaam
Therinjaa vazhve bore-udaa.

Live the moment, live the moment
live the moment live the moment now

Odum raththaththil minsaaram senjukitta
mannil minvette illaiyada.
Kadhal muththathil minsaram senjukitta
nenjil minvette illaiyada.

cigarettum venaam, sarakellaam venaam
warning-u potte kollvaangadaa
neethaan un hero, neethaan un villain
un vazhva neeye kondaadudaa.

Makeup venaam vesam venaam
unmaiyya nee vazhu da.
packup aagum naalai enni
vazhum vazhve bore-udaa

Nethu kanneera innaikku sindhaadhada
indha nimishaththil nee vazhuda.
naalai rupaava innaiku ennaadhada
indha nodiyodu vilaiyaadudaa.

T20 kooda palasaagi pochu
T10 un vazhkka run thaedu.
miss panna ballu kiss pannum stumpa
boldaagaama boldaa nee aadu.

Kaau illaa scor-u illaa
aattam peru, vazhkkadaa.
adutha over theriyavenaam
therinjaa vazhve boruda..

live the moment , live the moment
live the moment , live the moment now
category: Song:Live The Moment - Kathai Thiraikathai Vasanam
